name: Layout Primitives
description: Framework-agnostic layout primitives for page composition. Includes Flow, Container, Grid, Box, Page, Section, AppShell, Header, Footer, Main, Spacer, Center, Split, and Wrap components.

accessibility.screenReader: Layout components use semantic HTML elements where appropriate. AppShell regions include ARIA landmark roles (banner, main, contentinfo).

recommendedUsage: Use Flow for 1D layouts (rows/columns), Container for max-width constraints, Grid for 2D layouts. Compose pages with AppShell, Page, and Section components.
antiPatterns: Do not use raw CSS values - all props accept design tokens only. Do not nest AppShell components.
